TopicTitle: Cinematic Space Video (The Great Gig in the Sky)

Articles.Content:
Who doesn't like a good bit of eye candy? Who also doesn't like some Pink Floyd?

Well, I've mixed the two and I think that the results are good, even if I do say so myself!

Please do watch the video as I think you will enjoy it

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yveP2hrDOgQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The visuals come from SPACE ENGINE

The song is ''The Great Gig in the Sky'' by Pink Floyd

Cheers!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T20:55:58Z" title="06/21/2015 08:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by EliteShadowLeo**

> 
> The visuals come from the free to play game SPACE ENGINE

*Free to play* sounds like there is some money extortion scheme going on. It is a free game, or freeware - nothing costs money, though donations are accepted if you enjoy it.

It is hard to imagine something that good could be had for nothing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yeah I see what you mean, didn't know what else to call it. Ill re-word it!

I guess it's good that Space Engine doesn't cost Money\*.

\*also by Pink Floyd

More to the point, this looks like it's worth it to check out.
